thread.title: Oprah teams up with Weight Watchers
thread.title_full: Oprah teams up with Weight Watchers

title: Oprah teams up with Weight Watchers
text:
Updated: 12:26 a.m. Tuesday, Oct. 20, 2015 | Posted: 11:09 a.m. Monday, Oct. 19, 2015 Oprah teams up with Weight Watchers ﻿ View Larger FILE - In this Wednesday, Oct. 14, 2015, file photo, Oprah Winfrey attends the premiere of the Oprah Winfrey Network's (OWN) documentary series "Belief," at The TimesCenter in New York. Weight Watchers announced Monday, Oct. 19, 2015, that Winfrey is taking an approximately 10 percent stake in Weight Watchers for about $43.2 million and joining the weight management company’s board. (Photo by Greg Allen/Invision/AP, File) Related Hot 99.5 - Duval 
Oprah Winfrey and Weight Watchers have just announced a partnership. 
The billionaire bought a 10 percent stake in the company and also joins the Weight Watchers board of directors. That 10 percent stake cost Winfrey more than $43 million. 
>> Read more trending stories 
The Weight Watchers home page currently features a picture of Winfrey with a statement she wrote: "I'm ready. Are you? Come join me." 
The former talk show host will make appearances for the company and will also help develop programs and initiatives throughout the five-year partnership. 
Shortly after details about the deal were released, the company's shares dramatically increased. 
Talk about the Oprah effect!
